divs: Sighting DetailsI picked up a pair of field binoculers to look at some cloud formations and the direction they were moving.while i was watching them i noticed some birds in the distance. i moved my eyes off the binoculers and when i put my eyes back on them there it was. i first thougt it was a 747 but the more i looked it was not moving or if so it was very slow.i could not beleive what i was seeing, it was gigar shaped bright white with a dark center. i could not see it with a naked eye but with the binoculers it was very big. so much bigger than an commercial jet. it moved from the s.e. to the n.e. then i lost sight of it in the clouds. time of sighting was day light evening time.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Douglas
There were no other sightings in Douglas on or around August 15th 2012
Summary: i was watching some cloud movements and birds when i seen the craft.
